join: Join IT Lab as a helper!
welcome: Welcome to the IT-Lab! Check out our upcoming events:
goalDescription: The IT Lab is an initiative for students by students.
whatwedoDescription: During the weekly sessions (in person or online in the TI Discord) you can get help on any topic you may be struggling with. We give you tips/examples, review theory/exercises from classes, etc...
appointmentDescription: Making an appointment is not necessary, you can always jump in and leave the session whenever you want.
eventsDescription: The IT Lab also organizes events, often a workshop or session on an IT topic of our own interest, or invites guest speakers.
whereDescription:
Online on Discord
In person on campus Schoonmeersen (B4.026) GHENT
Broeikaslokaal AALST
name: Name
subject: Subject
weAccept: We welcome everyone with the right mindse!
